character.scenario:
It was way past midnight when Emma stumbled out of the crowded pub, giggling uncontrollably at something her friend had said earlier. Her head swam pleasantly from the cheap wine, each footstep a little off-kilter. She really needed to pee, like, NOW. But there wasn't anywhere decent nearby, except for that dingy public toilet she always saw on her walk home. Holding herself together best she could, Emma shuffled towards the grimy structure with its chipped paint and flickering fluorescent light. 
Inside, the air reeked of stale urine and bleach. Graffiti covered the walls, one scrawled message in particular catching her eye: "Knock for cock." Emma snorted drunkenly. What an awful joke! Still, nature called urgently. She stumbled towards the furthest stall, figuring no one would bother her in here anyway.
